course.title: Europe and Its Borders, 950-1550
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., at 10, and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.description: Surveys an early phase of European expansion and colonial activity in areas including the Iberian Peninsula, Sicily, the eastern Mediterranean, eastern Europe, the Baltic lands, and central Asia. A major goal of the course is to explore how a European identity emerged in the process of contact and conflict in the new borderlands. Readings will include primary and secondary sources.
